fields.description: Benefit from our global management expertise with 70% of our leaders Lean Six Sigma trained

fields.title: Flexible engagements
fields.description: Our BPE consulting is customizable to a clientâ€™s needs based on organization size, processes and facilities. You decide just how far you want us to go ranging from recommendations to full implementation including change management support.

fields.title: Advisory Services
fields.description: Carve out a competitive edge with our tailored services to drive business improvements.

fields.title: Process Diagnostics
fields.description: Through Process Diagnostics, we deliver a comprehensive report containing a list of identified process opportunities along with recommendations for potential improvements, including an assessment of implementation difficulty and ROI impact. Quick wins are also identified.
Reduction in waste in Average Handle Time - results achieved for a large retail client

fields.title: Workshop & Training
fields.description: Our Workshop & Training offering is based on our unique Own-it / Workout methodology, designed to engage your key stakeholders to help identify and prioritize business problems. Workshops are a great tool for engagement of employees and enablement of quick wins.

fields.title: Why TELUS International?
fields.description: We combine leadership, teamwork and problem solving to promote continuous improvement.

fields.quote: Implementing Business Process Management boosts the success rate of projects by 70%

fields.description: Calculated ROI in cost savings via process and technology recommendations - potential results for a large retail client

fields.title: To Do Process Consulting  SEO
fields.description: To Do Process Consulting  SEO

fields.title: Expertise
fields.description: When it comes to working with us, we remain flexible and agile to meet your needs. This means you can implement our recommendations, or engage us to put them in place. Our services range from light-touch to full service based on your exact needs at the time
Reduction in contacts over a 12-month period - results achieved for a large retail client

fields.title: Process Transformation
fields.description: Through a combination of onsite and offsite consulting, our Process Transformation practice aims to move your business from current state to desired state. Our methodology includes process documentation, analysis of current opportunities, workshop facilitation to drive future state alignment and leading the execution of change management.

fields.ref: Benefits - Process Consulting - Ecosystem of innovation
fields.title: Ecosystem of innovation
fields.description: While we are experts in contact centers and customer experience, it doesnâ€™t stop there. We have a full suite of digital CX accelerators to assist with transformation including AI, Bots, Cloud, Mobile, Big Data solutions and more. We bring our entire CX and DX toolkit to the table to identify innovation opportunities for your business.

fields.title: Process Documentation
fields.description: Our Process Documentation solutions provide clients with an option for documentation of operational processes for knowledge transfer, business continuity and training purposes. Our BPE team uses the Agile Documentation Methodology to extract process details from your company experts. The knowledge is later used to create process flows, manuals and desktop procedures.

fields.ref: Link - Experience the Culture Value Chain - /culture-value-chain
fields.title: Experience the Culture Value Chain
Industry expertise
fields.description: With 70% of our leaders Lean Six Sigma trained, we focus on the right processes to achieve desired outcomes. This means first aligning with your goals,  analyzing the customer journey, and documenting current processes to have a clear benchmark to measure success  and ROI.

fields.title: Placing customers and the value of human connection first
fields.description: Our integrated DX and CX solutions are focused on building human connection without ever losing sight of what matters most â€“ the value of corporate culture and its impact on engagement and innovation.

fields.title: Data Analysis
fields.description: Our Data Analysis offering provides clients with a comprehensive analysis of call drivers, call trends, call practices and customer behavior based on data analysis and descriptive/inferential statistics.

fields.title: Process Consulting
fields.subtitle: Our practice is on a quest to uncover the right processes for clients to deliver on their brand promise to customers. We seek to break down barriers, cross organizational silos and identify the priorities to enhance business and enable transformation.
fields.body: By focusing on the needs of the customer, empowering frontline team members and optimizing existing activities, we create additional value and return on investment for our clients. We employ Lean and Six Sigma methodologies and always remain focused on desired customer outcomes. Our expertise includes conducting fast-path process mapping, documentation, data gathering, data analysis, management validations and debriefs.
